Text: WOW What a pity he wasn't in copenhagen 5 days before. thnx man
I was at the O2 last Thursday. Amazing stuff.
Thanks so much, Anonymous, whoever and wherever you are. Tremendous quality, a great souvenir of a magical moment. I was one of many 'middle-aged' men in tears at the O2 that night...

I am speechless!  Thank you sooooo much for uploading.  Waters is a genious and so is Gilmour.  It is wonderful to see them together.

I hope this comes out on the DVD.  I'll be standing in line to buy it.  Thanks again.
